Title: Requires the department of transportation to include in its existing vegetative management program the removal of invasive vines
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to include in its existing vegetative management program the removal of invasive vines which are so hazardous that they pose an imminent danger of causing trees or tree limbs to fall onto highways.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to include in its existing vegetative management program the removal of invasive vines
